briefdescription.para: Differentiate an expression from its representation in Fourier space by multiplying by -i * k and then converting back to real space.

parameterdescription.para: The Field where the derivative will be saved.
The derivative of the function in Fourier space will be saved.
The Field containing the values of the function in Fourier space.
The dimension along which the expression is differentiated.

briefdescription.para: A function to solve the Poisson equation in Fourier space This function should be private. It is not due to the inclusion of a KOKKOS_LAMBDA.

parameterdescription.para: The solution to the Poisson equation in Fourier space.
The right-hand side of the Poisson equation in Fourier space.

The Field containing the values of the function in Fourier space.
The dimension along which the expression is differentiated.

briefdescription.para: A constructor for the FFT Poisson solver. This constructor calls ddc::init_discrete_space so it should only be called once per simulation.

parameterdescription.para: The index range on which the equation should be solved.

memberdef.definition: virtual field_type FFTPoissonSolver< IdxRange< GridPDEDim1D... >, IdxRangeFull, ExecSpace, LayoutSpace >::operator()
memberdef.name: operator()
memberdef.qualifiedname: FFTPoissonSolver< IdxRange< GridPDEDim1D... >, IdxRangeFull, ExecSpace, LayoutSpace >::operator()

briefdescription.para: An operator which calculates the solution $\phi$ to Poisson's equation: $ - \Delta \phi = \rho $.

parameterdescription.para: The solution to Poisson's equation.
The right-hand side of Poisson's equation.

simplesect.para: A reference to the solution to Poisson's equation.

memberdef.definition: virtual field_type FFTPoissonSolver< IdxRange< GridPDEDim1D... >, IdxRangeFull, ExecSpace, LayoutSpace >::operator()
memberdef.argsstring: (field_type phi, vector_field_type E, field_type rho) const final
memberdef.name: operator()
memberdef.qualifiedname: FFTPoissonSolver< IdxRange< GridPDEDim1D... >, IdxRangeFull, ExecSpace, LayoutSpace >::operator()

briefdescription.para: An operator which calculates the solution $\phi$ to Poisson's equation and its derivative: $ - \Delta \phi = \rho $ $ E = - \nabla \phi $.

parameterdescription.para: The solution to Poisson's equation.
The derivative of the solution to Poisson's equation.
The right-hand side of Poisson's equation.

simplesect.para: A reference to the solution to Poisson's equation.

briefdescription.para: A class to solve the following equation: $ -\Delta \phi = \rho $ using a Fourier transform.

detaileddescription.para:
The implementation of this class can be found at FFTPoissonSolver< IdxRange<GridPDEDim1D...>, IdxRangeFull, ExecSpace, LayoutSpace >.
IdxRangeLaplacian
The index range on which the equation is defined.
IdxRangeFull
The index range on which the operator() acts. This is equal to the IdxRangeLaplacian plus any batched dimensions.
ExecSpace
The space (CPU/GPU) where the calculations will take place.
LayoutSpace
The layout space of the Fields passed to operator().
